direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle whitespace normalization with similar control flows and use of StringBuilder.
Both methods deal with string processing and whitespace handling.
Both methods manipulate strings and handle collections of strings.
Both methods handle exceptions related to string processing and URL resolution.
Both methods involve state management of StringBuilder instances.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializes a StringBuilder instance required for appendNormalisedWhitespace.
Preprocesses the string to normalize whitespace before appending.
Releases the StringBuilder instance after appendNormalisedWhitespace is done.
